Ok, so I tried to reply to this once before and my computer booted me 
off. I hope this doesn't end up posted twice...

What I was attempting to say was that I would love to see Hijikata's 
reaction to being glomped by a horde of us foreign devils and that it 
would be a Kodack moment for sure. I also wonder what he would think 
of those of us -whistles innocently- who are slightly obsessed with 
his fundoshi...

On another note, I was wondering if there was another way to reach 
Japanese Shinsengumi fans. I noted that on http://japanese.about.com/ 
they have a section for finding penpals. Is there anyway someone 
(preferably who understands more of the language than me!) might 
could use that to try and reach out to them?

-MissBehavin (Who must learn Japanese in order to perform her duties 
as Hijikata-sama's Chamber Maid more effectively. He does not like it 
when he finds his goldfish gatotsued...)
